definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
richly provided for/having enough and to spare

sentences.english: They promised her she would soon be rich beyond her wildest dreams.
sentences.chinese: 他們向她保證很快她就會變得超乎想像的富有。

sentences.english: He was endowed with the spirit of self-sacrifice.
China's biological resources are among the world's richest.
sentences.chinese: 中國生物資源是在最富有之中在世界上。
教學是一種富有價值的活動。

sentences.english: so we're relatively rich into, in the Caribbean, you know.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我們在加勒比海地區算是比較富有的。

sentences.english: A defense lawyer says Jufer was intoxicated at the time of his crime.
sentences.chinese: 律師以他那富有感染力的辯護說服了陪審團。

sentences.english: Thinking critically can enable one to analyze problems insightfully.
sentences.chinese: 批判性思考能夠使你在分析問題時富有洞察力。

sentences.english: He who despises small things seldom grows rich.
sentences.chinese: 蔑視小事物者難成富有者。

sentences.english: Upon arrival you will have the local kampong style breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 抵達後，體驗富有當地部落風俗的早餐。

sentences.english: They turned down or gave up comfort and wealth in order to fight for what is right.
sentences.chinese: 他們拒絕或放棄安逸與富有，爲正義而鬥爭。

sentences.english: Hi is the richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature.
sentences.chinese: 知足常樂者最富有，因爲知足本身就是財富。

sentences.english: First, we should develop a dynamic, innovation-driven growth model.
sentences.chinese: 創新驅動，打造富有活力的增長模式。

sentences.english: He fawns on his rich uncle.
This can go beyond old-fashioned trust falls to more imaginative retreats.
sentences.chinese: 這可以超越老式的信任，達到更富有想象力的改變。

sentences.english: Mr. Yang Kehe is the management elite with foresight and dedicated spirit.
sentences.chinese: 遠見卓識富有奉獻精神的管理精英。
這是一種富有創造力的表現自我的方式。

definition: to be full of/to be rich in
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
out of the ordinary/unusually (good, talented etc)
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
